questions.question: Natural language processing is needed when you wish to mine data and extract meaningful insight from text.
[Select Two] In a digital marketing firm, which of the following is a crucial data set for you to analyze?
options: Ensure your customers are fully aware of which algorithms you used for transparency sake.
Strive to adopt a personalized 'chat and listen' approach versus a 'yell and sell' approach.

Being always on and keeping it real becomes therefore much more important for a brand than being picture 
or pixel perfect (and thus only sporadically on/always late).
Do not throw away any data points, it all helps to predict a better outcome

questions.question: For a natural language processing (NLP) system, which of the following poses the greatest challenge?
When you purchase an item from Amazon, it also suggests to you other related items. What is the name of that AI engine that brings forth suggestions as such?

Digressions allow for the user to break away from a specific conversation in order to temporarily change the topic before returning to the original dialog flow. How do you set up digressions in Watson Assistant?
Which of the following is an example of an Intent used in the Watson Assistant service?
Is it possible to use more than one service in a given application deployed on IBM Cloud?
options: Absolutely yes. You can add a number of connections to the app, each connection being a separate API
You will need a new app for each service.
Yes, but only if you upgrade to Premium service plan.
It is possible, but you must limit it to a maximum of two services per deployed application.

questions.question: To build a conversation agent or a virtual agent that can sense and respond accordingly to frustrated or joyful inflections in human voice, you would need the Conversation service plus a minimum of what other essential service?
[Select all that apply] When you think of the syntax of a sentence, which of the following comes to mind?
[Select Two] Why would you want to have more than one Workspace in a single instance of your Watson Assistant?
options:
You could use one workspace for regular chit-chat and the second one 
for the domain-specific business conversations.
Each workspace could act as a separate bot or application
You can only have one Workspace per Instance, unless you upgrade to Premium
None of the above is true.

questions.question: In a conversational world, marketers can no longer rely on the 'yell & sell' approach and hope for the best. They need to 'chat and listen.' Which of the following terms best describes the new challenges that marketing departments face?
options: They need artificial general intelligence (AGI) to address this issue.
It's about having immense amounts of data.

questions.question: How is the syntax of a sentence different from the semantics of the same sentence?
options: Syntax refers to the grammar of the sentence, namely, object-subject-verb.
Semantics refers to the Agent and Patient relationship of words in a sentence.
Semantics refers to the meaning of the sentence.
